channel.title: Cameras on Grainy Photos
channel.description: Recent content in Cameras on Grainy Photos

item.title: Mamiya RB67
item.description: About the Mamiya RB67, a legendary medium-format film camera that has gained immense popularity among professional photographers and enthusiasts since its introduction in 1970.

item.title: Pentax MX
item.description: The Pentax MX was a 35 mm SLR camera manufactured by Asahi Optical Co. between 1976 and 1985. A fully mechanical and well-built camera, highly valued to this day.

item.title: Kodak Six-20 Brownie E
item.description: The Kodak Six-20 Brownie E is a box-type camera from the 1940-50s. The styling is from the early Art Deco period with rounded corners typical of the Streamline Moderne period.

item.title: Zeiss Ikon Ikoflex IIa 855/16 Camera
item.description: The Zeiss Ikon Ikoflex IIa 855/16 is a simple twin-lens reflex (TLR) camera, almost spartan, with good clean lines.
